name: Old Pals
commands: Hah! Smoke, Landros, Aerial! How's it going?
Hey! Your Highness, give us some SAGE advice!
Uh, well something I learned recently was...|ALWAYS CHECK THE RULES OF THE CARD GAME YOU'RE PLAYING!
Don't tell me you lost a lot of money.
Uhm, alright! I won't!|My mouth? Shut!
It's okay your Highness, I'm sure I can win it back.
His skills will DEAL some serious damage to anyone's wallets!
That was a stretch and you know it.
C'mon guys. A little less bickering in front of the prince.
You could stay with us, come back home?
Hello? We're looking for an Anne, Sir.
I think his silence is the answer, but why?

Travelling far and wide, meeting new people...|Seeing what the world has to offer...|If I go home, I'm sure I'll have to do boring strategy stuff with father.|I just don't want to end up stuck in the castle, watching him... get worse...
Well, given things might be getting lively soon...|You might be needed to travel some more on his behalf.|Also, you would'a been sent to Aurelia... had you been home.
Good, also you can lean on us, your Highness.|If you need to...
